prabhasanshleshanaya - wikipidiya (prabhasansleshanaya wethin yali-yomu karana ladi) prabhasanshleshanaya yanu, aalokaya athiwita kaban dayoksayid ha jalaya upayogi karagena prakasha sa්wayanposhi jiwinta awashya kabanika drawya sanshleshanaya karaganime pariwruththiya kriyawaliya yi.me sandaha kabandayoksayid wayuwa, harithaprada, jalaya saha hirueliya amudrawya lesa bhawitha wana athara enayin hiru eliya saha kabandayoksayid wayuwa bahira sadhaka lesa da jalaya ha harithaprada abhyanthara sadhaka lesa da salake.

kristhiyaniya mulinma janapriya wune roma adhirajyaye wahalun wu pradhana washayen grikayan atharayi.pethaෲs ha pawul yudewwan wunath yudewwangen owunata piliganimak labune naha.wisheshayen pawul grik sabhyathwaye balapamata lak wuna.semitik dahama wenuwata uuru mas kamata haki charma chedanaya thawa duratath awashya nowana dahamak nirmanaya wune eseyi.me aluth dahama siya nirmanayen wiyuktha dewiya wenuwata nirmanaya ha eekathmika aadi brahman wani sankalpayak goda naguna.ee wanawita yuropaye balawathwa thibu ayisis ha sayibili wani dewamatha wandanayanta kristhiyani swarupayak dimath samagamiwa siduwuna.pasu kaleka matin luthara uthsaha kale pirisidu yudew mulayan soya ganimatayi.
